message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While I believe this product is worth every penny of my initial offer, I'm willing to come down to $110 for you. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could we possibly settle on $100 for the product?
